body:
Comment 10: 
I am not convinced we should make the change. No API we have used so far requires it.

Do you have a particular problem at hand? Or you are just trying to make syscall.Syscall
"spec compliant". As far as I could see, you proposal will complicate runtime code. Why?
What is the benefit? What is the problem you are trying to solve? For you dll, just
change parameters to return whatever you want to return via stack.

Alex
